mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_notification (sender_id, receiver_id, checked) VALUES (#{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{notificationChecked})
mapper.select: SELECT notification_id AS notificationId, sender_id AS senderId, sender_nickname AS senderNickname, sender_file_path AS senderFilePath, sender_file_name AS senderFileName, receiver_id AS receiverId, notification_type AS notificationType, checked AS notificationChecked, created_date AS createdDate, thumbnail_path AS thumbnailPath, thumbnail_name AS thumbnailName FROM view_notification WHERE receiver_id = #{receiverId} ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_notification WHERE receiver_id = #{receiverId} AND checked = '안읽음'
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_notification SET checked = '읽음' WHERE receiver_id = #{receiverId} AND checked = '안읽음'
